import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Button, Checkbox, FormControlLabel, FormLabel, InputLabel, MenuItem, Radio, RadioGroup, Select, TextField } from '@mui/material' import { FormControl } from '@mui/base' import { AdapterDayjs } from '@mui/x-date-pickers/AdapterDayjs'; import { DatePicker, LocalizationProvider } from '@mui/x-date-pickers' import styles from './employeeForm.module.scss' const EmployeeForm = (props) => { const {handleChange} = props const [empData, setEmpData] = useState({ fullName: "", email: "", contact: "", city: "", skill: "", gender: "" }) const handelOnChange = (key, value) => { // setEmpData(e.target.value) setUserData((prevValue) => ({...prevValue, [key]: value})); } const handelSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault() console.log(empData) } return (
Name handelOnChange('fullName', e.target.value)} />
Email handelOnChange('email', e.target.value)} />
Contact Number handelOnChange('number', e.target.value)} />
City
D.O.B handelOnChange('date', e.target.value)} />
Skills
handelOnChange('gender', e.target.value)} > } label="Female" /> } label="Male" /> } label="Other" />

) } export default EmployeeForm
